Home (hero)

EMUS (Electric Motorcycle of Université de Sherbrooke) is a student engineering team developing a 100% electric race motorcycle for the MotoStudent competition in Spain.

Quick facts

  • MotoStudent final event: Oct 2027
  • 2023: 13th worldwide, 1st among American teams

About MotoStudent

MotoStudent is an international engineering competition where university teams design and build a race motorcycle prototype, evaluated at MotorLand Aragón (Alcañiz, Spain). Categories include Petrol and Electric.

Support EMUS: funding, manufacturing, materials, and technical mentorship.
